channel.title: HHS Spanish 1
channel.itunes:subtitle: Holliston High School Spanish 1
channel.itunes:author: Paul Whalen
channel.itunes:summary: Each week we will bring you a podcast that corresponds to what is happening in your Spanish Class. Listen on your computer, burn to a CD or load it up on your mp3 player. Be sure to repeat the dialogue as often as possible and remember a few minutes a day can make all the difference
channel.description: Each week we will bring you a podcast that corresponds to what is happening in your Spanish Class. Listen on your computer, burn to a CD or load it up on your mp3 player. Be sure to repeat the dialogue as often as possible and remember a few minutes a day can make all the difference

item.title: Lesson 01 Greetings
item.itunes:author: Whalen Dinizio
item.itunes:subtitle: HHS Spanish 1 - Greetings and nationality
item.itunes:summary: Say hello in Spanish and ask someones nationality

item.title: Lesson 02 How Are You?
item.itunes:author: Whalen
item.itunes:subtitle: HHS Spanish 1 - How are you?
item.itunes:summary: Ask how your friends are doing

item.title: Lesson 03 Whats your name?
item.itunes:author: Whalen
item.itunes:subtitle: HHS Spanish 1 - What's your name, my family member names
item.itunes:summary: Tell your name and the names of your family members

item.title: Lesson 04 Time
item.itunes:author: Whalen
item.itunes:subtitle: HHS Spanish 1 - The basics of telling time in Spanish
item.itunes:summary: Tell time on the hour, on the quarter hour and the half hour

item.title: Lesson 05 Where Are You Going
item.itunes:author: Whalen
item.itunes:subtitle: HHS Spanish 1 - Ask where you friends are going and let them know where you are going
item.itunes:summary: Learn the names for some general locations

item.title: Lesson 06 Weather
item.itunes:author: Whalen
item.itunes:subtitle: HHS Spanish 1 - Oh, the weather outside is...
item.itunes:summary: Learn the most basic weather descriptions in Spanish

item.title: Lesson 07 Where Is...
item.itunes:author: Whalen
item.itunes:subtitle: HHS Spanish 1 - Where did I leave my...
item.itunes:summary: Learn the names for some general locations

item.title: Lesson 08 Los Numeros
item.itunes:author: Whalen
item.itunes:subtitle: HHS Spanish 1 - What's your phone number
item.itunes:summary: Learn to count and tell friends your phone number

item.title: Lesson 09 I like and I don't like
item.itunes:author: Whalen Miracle
item.itunes:subtitle: HHS Spanish 1 - Tell people what activities you like to do.

item.title: Lesson 10 Mis Amigos
item.itunes:author: Paul Whalen
item.itunes:subtitle: HHS Spanish 1 - Describe your friends
item.itunes:summary: Using the verb ES - he/she is and the verb TIENE - he/she has

item.title: Lesson 11 The Verb Ser - to be
item.itunes:author: Paul Whalen
item.itunes:subtitle: HHS Spanish 1 - Let's talk about professions
item.itunes:summary: Let's talk about professions using the verb SER
